ALGS.TA.summary: Alon Natural Gas Exploration Ltd. engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas properties in Israel, Jordan, and Egypt. The company's products include natural gas and natural gas condensate. It serves Israel Electric Corporation Ltd., private power manufacturers, industrial clients, and marketing companies of natural gas. The company was formerly known as Dor-Alon Holdings in Gas Exploration Ltd. and changed its name to Alon Natural Gas Exploration Ltd. in November 2009. Alon Natural Gas Exploration Ltd. was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Yakum, Israel. Alon Natural Gas Exploration Ltd. is a subsidiary of Alon Israel Oil Company Ltd.

DELKY.summary: Delek Group Ltd., an energy company, engages in the exploration and production of oil and gas in Israel and internationally. The company operates in Energy in Israel and Energy Abroad segments. It holds interests in the Tamar, Leviathan, and Aphrodite reservoirs in Cyprus; has rights to oil assets in the Gulf of Mexico and Canada, as well as oil and gas reserves in the North Sea off the coast of England; and owns production, treatment, and storage facilities. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Herzliya, Israel.

DLEKG.TA.summary: Delek Group Ltd., an energy company, engages in the exploration and production of oil and gas in Israel and internationally. The company operates in Energy in Israel and Energy Abroad segments. It holds interests in the Tamar, Leviathan, and Aphrodite reservoirs in Cyprus; has rights to oil assets in the Gulf of Mexico and Canada, as well as oil and gas reserves in the North Sea off the coast of England; and owns production, treatment, and storage facilities. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Herzliya, Israel.

DLKGF.summary: Delek Group Ltd., an energy company, engages in the exploration and production of oil and gas in Israel and internationally. The company operates in Energy in Israel and Energy Abroad segments. It holds interests in the Tamar, Leviathan, and Aphrodite reservoirs in Cyprus; has rights to oil assets in the Gulf of Mexico and Canada, as well as oil and gas reserves in the North Sea off the coast of England; and owns production, treatment, and storage facilities. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Herzliya, Israel.

DLRL.TA.summary: Delek Royalties (2012) Ltd., a special-purpose yield company, holds the right to receive overriding royalties in respect of oil and/or gas and/or other valuable materials derived from the shares of various oil and gas companies and entities in Israel. It holds rights to receive royalties from the Tamar Reservoir and Daliyat projects in Israel. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.

GIVO-L.TA.long_name: Givot Olam Oil Exploration - Limited Partnership (1993)
GIVO-L.TA.summary: Givot Olam Oil Exploration - Limited Partnership (1993) operates as an oil and gas exploration company in Israel. It primarily holds a 99% ownership in Meged oil field, which includes the Rosh Ha'Ayin lease I/11 covering an area of 243 square kilometers. Givot Olam Oil Limited serves as the general partner of the company. Givot Olam Oil Exploration - Limited Partnership (1993) was founded in 1992 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

GOOXF.long_name: Givot Olam Oil Exploration - Limited Partnership (1993)
GOOXF.summary: Givot Olam Oil Exploration - Limited Partnership (1993) operates as an oil and gas exploration company in Israel. It primarily holds a 99% ownership in Meged oil field, which includes the Rosh Ha'Ayin lease I/11 covering an area of 243 square kilometers. Givot Olam Oil Limited serves as the general partner of the company. Givot Olam Oil Exploration - Limited Partnership (1993) was founded in 1992 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

ILDR.TA.long_name: Israel Land Development - Urban Renewal Ltd
ILDR.TA.summary: Israel Land Development - Urban Renewal Ltd engages in urban renewal activities. The company was formerly known as Israel Land Development Alpha Ltd and changed its name to Israel Land Development - Urban Renewal Ltd. in February 2019. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Bnei Brak, Israel. Israel Land Development - Urban Renewal Ltd is a subsidiary of The Israel land Development Company Ltd.

ISOP-L.TA.summary: Israel Opportunity - Energy Resources, LP engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas properties. It holds a portfolio of participating rights in various offshore and onshore oil assets in Israel and North America. Israel Opportunity Â Oil and Gas Exploration Ltd. serves as a general partner of the company. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

ISRA-L.TA.summary: Isramco Negev 2 Limited Partnership engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas in Israel, Jordan, and Egypt. The company offers condensate, as well as natural gas. Its properties include the Tamar and Dalit reservoirs located in the Haifa coast; Daniel East and Daniel West situated in the northwest Ashdod; and Shimshon reservoir located in the west Ashkelon coast. It serves industrial customers, private electricity providers, and natural gas marketing companies, as well as the Israel Electric Company through its five oil assets. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Petah Tikva, Israel.

LAPD.TA.summary: Lapidoth Capital Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, provides drilling and related services in Israel. It operates through International Trade, Distribution of Samsung Mobile Phones, Investments, Oil and Water Drilling, and Prospecting and Production of Oil and Gas segments. The company is involved in the design and operation of onshore oil, gas, and water drilling and production activities; and provision of auxiliary services related to exploration and production, such as drilling, downhole geophysical logging, cementation, perforation, CCTV monitoring, production, petro physics, reservoir engineering, logistics, research drilling, and soil sampling. It also offers wireline equipment and services for oil, gas, and water wells, as well as for mineral and geotechnical boreholes. In addition, the company engages in oil and gas prospecting and production activities. It holds interest in two licenses in the Heletz field located in southern Israel; and in OZ and Arye marine license located in the coast of Netanya. In addition, the company trades in consumer goods, such as apparel, sporting and outdoor goods, footwear, watches, accessories, and jewelry; invests in marketable securities and real-estate properties; provides capital market transactions; and distributes Samsung mobile phones. Lapidoth Capital Ltd was founded in 1959 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

MDIN-L.TA.summary: Modiin Energy-Limited Partnership engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas projects. It holds interests in the Mountainview, GrapeVine, Casini, and Shideler assets that are located in California, the United States; and Shimshon in Israel. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

NFTA.TA.summary: Naphtha Israel Petroleum Corp. Ltd. engages in the exploration, production, and sale of oil and gas in Israel and the United States. The company offers natural gas and condensate gas. As of December 31, 2015, its property consisted of I/12 Tamar lease, I/13 Dalit lease, 392/ Daniel West license, 391/ Daniel East license, and 1/18 Shimshon lease, as well as a proved reserve of 7,291.3 BCF of natural gas and 9.5 million barrels of gas condensate in Tamar and Tamar reserve SW. The company is also involved in real estate and hotel businesses in Israel, Germany, Hungary, and the Czech Republic. Its customers include electricity companies, industrial customers, and private electricity producers and companies. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Petah Tikva, Israel. Naphtha Israel Petroleum Corp. Ltd. is a former subsidiary of J.O.E.L. Jerusalem Oil Exploration Ltd.

NVPT-L.TA.summary: Navitas Petroleum, Limited Partnership engages in the exploration and development of oil and natural gas. Its asset portfolio includes Buckskin and Shenandoah projects, and Neches oil property; and exploration prospects in the United States and Canada. The company is based in Herzliya, Israel.

PTX.TA.summary: Petrotx - Limited Partnership engages in the development and production of oil and natural gas in Israel and the United States. Petrotx - Limited Partnership was formerly known as Zerah Oil & Gaz Explorations L.P. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

RATI-L.TA.summary: Ratio Oil Exploration (1992) Limited Partnership engages in the exploration, development, and production of natural gas, oil, and condensates. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

RTPT-L.TA.summary: Ratio Petroleum Energy - Limited Partnership engages in exploration, development, and production of oil and gas worldwide. It holds petroleum rights in two different basins covering an area of 22,330 square kilometers in Guyana-Suriname and the Philippines. The company is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

TMRP.TA.summary: Tamar Petroleum Ltd engages in the exploration and production of natural gas in Israel. It has 16.75% interest rights in the Tamar and Dalit reservoirs located in west of Haifa. The company supplies natural gas to the State of Israel, private electricity producers, industrial customers, and natural gas marketing firms, as well as exports to Jordan. In addition, it sells condensate produced from the Tamar project to Paz Ashdod Oil Refineries. The company was formerly known as Karish and Tanin Management Ltd. and changed its name to Tamar Petroleum Ltd in May 2017. Tamar Petroleum Ltd was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Herzliya Pituach, Israel.
